title: ICE when attempting to destructure a match pattern with a primitive type

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Attempting to use destructuring with a primitive type inside a match statement causes an ICE. Tested with rustc 1.2.0-nightly (a9515698f 2015-06-20)

``` rust
fn main() {
    match 'a' {
        char{ch} => true
    }
}
```

```
error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'attempted .def_id() on DefPrimTy', ../src/librustc/middle/def.rs:156
```
